title: Caution: Sexy When Wet
itunes:title: Caution: Sexy When Wet
itunes:subtitle: On today’s show, Emily’s answering your emails, addressing some of your most pressing sex and relationship questions. Do your partner’s fantasies have you feeling less than confident in the bedroom? When’s the best time to tell a new lover...
description:
On today’s show, Emily’s answering your emails, addressing some of your most pressing sex and relationship questions.

Do your partner’s fantasies have you feeling less than confident in the bedroom? When’s the best time to tell a new lover that you’re a squirter? And what do you do when SHE comes too quickly? Emily and Anderson answer your emails, discuss the dilemma of dating with kids and even debate some of Redditor’s top sex tips. Plus, how many college students are actually hot for teacher? Find out in this information-packed podcast!

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
